basics.description: **Nexus Enterprise Plan** is our premium offering designed for large enterprises requiring the most advanced document intelligence capabilities with enterprise-grade security, compliance, and support. This comprehensive solution includes unlimited document processing, advanced multimodal AI, enterprise security & compliance, and dedicated enterprise support with 99.9% uptime SLA.

validations.message: Must have read access to AKS clusters

elements.name: clusterSelection
elements.label: AKS Cluster
elements.toolTip: Select the Azure Kubernetes Service cluster where you want to deploy the Nexus Enterprise Platform

constraints.allowedValues: [map(steps('basics').clusterLookupControl.value, (item) => parse(concat('{"label":"', item.name, ' (', item.location, ')","value":{"name":"', item.name, '","resourceGroup":"', last(take(split(item.id, '/'), 5)), '","location":"', item.location, '"}}')))]

elements.name: namespace
elements.label: Kubernetes Namespace
elements.toolTip: Enter the Kubernetes namespace where the Nexus Enterprise platform will be deployed

constraints.validationMessage: Namespace must be lowercase alphanumeric characters or '-', and must start and end with an alphanumeric character

elements.name: huggingfaceApiKey
elements.toolTip: Enter your HuggingFace API key (starts with 'hf_'). This is required for advanced AI model access.

constraints.validationMessage: HuggingFace API key must start with 'hf_' followed by at least 34 characters

elements.name: openaiApiKey
elements.toolTip: Enter your OpenAI API key (starts with 'sk-'). This is required for GPT model integration and advanced language processing.

constraints.validationMessage: OpenAI API key must start with 'sk-' followed by at least 20 characters

elements.name: storageAccountName
elements.label: Storage Account Name
elements.toolTip: Name of the Azure Storage Account for blob storage (must be globally unique)

constraints.validationMessage: Storage account name must be 3-24 characters long and contain only lowercase letters and numbers

elements.name: storageAccountKey
elements.toolTip: Enter the access key for your Azure Storage Account. You can find this in Azure Portal > Storage Account > Access Keys.

constraints.validationMessage: Storage account key must be a valid base64 encoded key (88 characters + ==)

elements.name: uploadContainerName
elements.label: Document Upload Container
elements.toolTip: Name of the blob container for document uploads

constraints.validationMessage: Container name must be 3-63 characters long, lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only

elements.name: processingContainerName
elements.label: Document Processing Container
elements.toolTip: Name of the blob container for document processing

constraints.validationMessage: Container name must be 3-63 characters long, lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only

elements.name: extractedDataContainerName
elements.label: Extracted Data Container
elements.toolTip: Name of the blob container for extracted data storage

constraints.validationMessage: Container name must be 3-63 characters long, lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only

elements.name: modelsContainerName
elements.label: AI Models Container
elements.toolTip: Name of the blob container for AI models storage

constraints.validationMessage: Container name must be 3-63 characters long, lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only

elements.name: postgresPassword
elements.toolTip: Secure password for the enterprise PostgreSQL database with encryption at rest

constraints.validationMessage: Enterprise password must be at least 12 characters long and contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number

elements.name: enableGpuServices
elements.label: Enable Advanced Multimodal AI (GPU Required)
elements.toolTip: Enable GPU-accelerated inference services for premium AI models with enhanced accuracy (requires GPU node pool in your AKS cluster)

elements.name: replicaCount
elements.label: High Availability Replicas
elements.toolTip: Number of replicas for core services to ensure enterprise-grade availability

elements.name: enableEnterpriseSecurity
elements.label: Enable Enterprise Security Features
elements.toolTip: Enable advanced security features including audit logs, data encryption, and compliance monitoring
